page.title: 01Rangemore District Survey
page.content: The area I live in is quite rural with some scattered farms and a small village called{Rangemore.}The land is undulating with a few small ponds and lakes amid the fields and woods. Two main roads cross the area. One runs north to south, and it is joined by another, from{Tatenhill,}in the east. There are two estates in the area, {Rangemore Park}and{Byrkley Park.}A large country house,{Rangemore Hall,} is in the centre. It was once the home of{Lord Burton,}but in 1954 was opened by Staffs County Council as the {Needwood School for Partially Hearing {Children.} In Rangemore there is a{primary {school, church, shop and post office, {club, hotel}and{recreation field. There is also a small{chocolate {factory}amidst this farming community.
